item.title: 3 techniques to create easy figures for your research paper.
item.description: Presentation of three framework that allow you to create figure for your paper only using text.

item.title: As an academic why should you master markdown
item.description: This article will presents important reason why you should master markdown to ease your academic journey.

item.title: Create fast reseach presentation using markdown and pandoc.
item.description: This article with present a pipeline to create fast and reliable power point presentation using markdown and pandoc that are well suited for research setup.

item.description: This article will present a set of tool to create latex table a .csv directly from python.

item.title: How to write good prompt for research ?
item.description: This article will provide the techniques to write good research prompts for different research activities.
